title: Draven Gameplay
body:
So, I have recently started to try and master Draven and I have a few questions.

When you are fighting 1v1, are you supposed to hit them twice and then proceed to retrieve axes.
 OR
Do you hit them once, click to one side and retrieve and repeat.

Same goes for teamights, really not sure how to fight with draven.

Draven is known to be a terrible ADC, that doesn't mean someone can't do well on him, but compared to other ADC's he is terrible.

it really depends, in my experience of playing draven, in 1v1's usually i would just run and get some kills whlist no going to catch the axes, with that being said dravens axes are suppose to follow your walking path, so they should just follow up most of the time, but i wouldn't recommended going and catch them axes soley because they could get away if like the axes has bounced to land behind you
